case_studies.title: Cape Town Tech Startup Crisis
case_studies.description: A local tech startup is struggling with declining sales. Analyze their data and provide strategic recommendations.
case_studies.scenario: TechCorp SA has seen a 30% drop in sales over the last quarter. As a business analyst, you need to identify the root causes and suggest solutions.
learning_objectives: Apply statistical analysis to business problems

questions.question: What is the main trend in TechCorp's revenue?
questions.explanation: Revenue has been consistently decreasing from R2.5M to R1.2M over 6 months.

questions.question: What percentage of market share does TechCorp have?
questions.explanation: TechCorp has 20% market share, which is the lowest among competitors.

questions.question: What would be the best strategy to improve sales?
questions.explanation: Customer retention is crucial as they've lost 55 customers in 6 months.

recommendations: Focus on Western Cape market expansion

case_studies.title: Johannesburg Retail Chain Expansion
case_studies.description: A retail chain wants to expand across South Africa. Use data analytics to recommend the best locations.
case_studies.scenario: ShopRight SA is planning to open 5 new stores. You need to analyze demographic and economic data to recommend optimal locations.
learning_objectives: Use geographic data for business decisions

questions.question: Which city has the highest population?
questions.explanation: Cape Town has the highest population at 4.6 million people.

questions.question: Which city offers the best growth potential?
questions.explanation: Pretoria has the highest growth rate at 3.1% and good average income.

questions.question: What factor should be prioritized for expansion?
questions.explanation: A balanced approach considering population, income, competition, and growth rate is best.

recommendations: Prioritize Pretoria and Cape Town for high-income potential
Avoid Bloemfontein due to low growth rate
Analyze competition levels before final decisions

case_studies.title: Durban Manufacturing Efficiency
case_studies.description: A manufacturing company needs to optimize their production processes using data analytics.
case_studies.scenario: AutoParts SA is experiencing production delays and quality issues. Use data to identify bottlenecks and improve efficiency.

questions.question: Which production line has the highest efficiency?
questions.explanation: Line B has the highest efficiency at 92%.

questions.question: Which line needs the most improvement?
questions.explanation: Line C has the lowest efficiency (78%) and highest defect rate (4.5%).

questions.question: What is the total daily production cost?
questions.explanation: Total cost = R4.5M + R2.8M + R1.2M + R0.35M = R8.85M

recommendations: Focus on improving Line C efficiency
